source.sqlReaderQuery:
select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SDE - CRM'

select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP  ='SDE - TQM 01'

select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SDE - ASA 02'

select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP  ='SDE - TQM 02'

select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SDE - ASA 01'

select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SDE - ASA 03'
